creator: pier@betaversion.org
text:
In the Java portion of the WebApp connector 
(org.apache.catalina.connectors.warp package) there are still few 
System.out() to clear (basically, move logging to the standard Catalina 
logging mechanism).

creator: pier@betaversion.org
text: Fixed. Now System.err is used ONLY if we're using a DEBUG build.
